forum.name: progress of a hobbo
forum.description: some way of letting you guys know i'm not just doing nothing.
forum.latestCommentText: it isn't important that i continue this to its last stage, it would only weigh down on me with all these other things i want to impliment.

thread.title: rigel

comments.text: he's doing fine at the moment. have yet to find any friends for him since noil is boring as heck and i'm too busy trying to fix everything.
i'm considering bring him with me and teaching him something usefull so he doesn't have so many panic attacks from the reality we live in now.
i caught him trying to hoard those orange crystals the other day. mind you, i don't have a problem with that, but i'm not yet entirely sure where they came from.
i haven't really had much time to teach him anything, so, i've deligated him the task of finding the blockage for the local river. i know what's causing it but whatever.
he's gone off somewere and left a note in that mountain side shed. it seems like he didn't appreciate that i made a transform card in his likeness that can actualy do magic.
rigel said he'd come back if i made/found a smaller artifact for him so he can stand out. i suppose it's only fair.
been exploring the caves more lately, i recomended rigel check that area since making an artifact isn't the same as finding one. i dont want to spoil him or anything.
